title: Lombo de São João
body: Settlement in the parish of Ponta do Sol. It is home to the chapel of S. João, which gave the place its name. The year of its original construction and its founder are unknown. It was a vincular institution and belonged to the estate of Diogo Berenguer de França, who in 1871 was granted the title of Viscount of São João, taken from this location.

Ponta do Sol: Locality on the island of Madeira

1871: Year in which Diogo Berenguer de França was granted the title of Viscount of São João
